name: BitDust
description: [BitDust](http://bitdust.io) - is decentralized, secure and anonymous on-line storage, where only the owner has access and absolute control over its data. BitDust project is aimed to protect users freedom and provide an alternative way to operate and communicate in the network. The software supposed to provide full control over your personal data and identification process among other users. The main goal is to protect user's access to personal data and thereby to protect the user's freedom in general.
